extendedInfo.description: Requires Android 2.2 / 2.3.2~~Issues before installing~ Blurry Icon's with Android 2.3.3 +~ Does not work on SGII~~ What to expect from Launcher~ Pure Stock with no Add-ons like adw or Launcher proSupported Phones.~ Evo / Nexus One / Nexus S / Droid X / Captivate / I9000 / Vibrant / G2 / MyTouch 4G / Desire HD / Droid IncredibleFull 3D Scrolling Supported. ( Hacked to Make Work, built from SDK version )~This will Not Turn your Phone into Gingerbread or even make it look like it.This is a Modded Stock Launcher!!Status Bar & Menu is controlled by Frameworks... Stop Being Noobs!!!

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: Works great on captivate 2.3.5. Love the clean look and feel!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: Screen is off center constantly. Apps still work, but I can\'t see one third of my menu. Smooth scrolling when in the menu is the only pro.
reviews.author: Dustin Hawkyard

reviews.title: Ummmm
reviews.comment: Doesnt look as its presented here...app drawer very sluggish too. ADWex is far superior
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on Atrix 4G
reviews.comment: Force closes everytime you hit the menu button & app drawer is all the way to the left, instead of being centered. :( looks great tho. Wish I could it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great on MT4G wish the menu bar at the bottom was blk, I now know it can\'t be.changed b/c of frameworks or something, changing from 4 to 5 stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Is amazing in android 2.3.4 is the only one works good in my galaxy s if you can fix the blur images you are good

reviews.comment: Wow complete waste of a download if u already hav 2.3 its the the only diff is browser nd phone icon nd manage app

reviews.title: Please Fix.
reviews.comment: App drawer shows up half way on a 720p display. Please fix! HTC Rezound

reviews.comment: And i care why? I just need something that i can communicate. The transform gets that accomplished. So hop off

reviews.title: Avoid this App
reviews.comment: This has been nothing but problems for me on my htc wildfire.

reviews.title: Thanks!
reviews.comment: Works great on my Galaxy S II running CM7. Such a clean and smooth launcher.

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Works wicked good on my mytouch 4G slide no issues with transition I just wish I could get sense widgets
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Please fix the 3d scrolling. It is off center! Other than that a great launcher but how am I supposed to get to my apps? uninstalled (LG Optimus S)

reviews.comment: Does not work in Atrix do to high resolution. Useable, but not 100%

reviews.comment: Call me a fool, but I dld this and I have fc every time

reviews.comment: freaking awesome, just wish it had 7 screens instead of 5 still sweet though
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: KungFuPanda261
reviews.comment: Excellent launcher, runs smooth. Best thing to do is install, set as default launcher, then reboot. Its as close to flashing as you can get, with no operation faults as far as I can tell.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Icons too small won\'t rotate when turning phone the home button doesn\'t work not happy uninstalling. Samsung galaxy 2.2 froyo
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Some people doesnt know what is a launcher. And keeps complaining that status bar is not styled. I lol\'d.
